legend_0090_friend_02:
Well, this is the lab.\c
I used to come here to play all the time when I
was a kid.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_03:
There’d better be a good reason for calling us
here like this...[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_05:
Everyone always says...[s;:gs]he’s some kinda genius.
Absolutely brilliant as a Pokémon Professor.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_07: But let me tell you—as a parent? [Sh;H:gs]e’s the worst.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_08:
All [s;:gs]he ever does is work. [Sh;H:gs]e never comes home.\c
I don’t have a single memory of h[er;im:gs] ever even
playing with me—h[er;is:gs] own kid.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_09:
Mabosstiff’s the only one who was there for me.
Always.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_10: Anyway. It’s open now. Go on in.[npcn:6]
legend_0090_friend_11: I just want to get this over with![npcn:6]
